NSCameraUsageDescription: We need the camera for profile photos.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We use your photos so you can upload profile pictures and verify yourself for trusted connections.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to show nearby profiles and apply your distance/visibility settings.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use your location only to show relevant connections nearby and respect your radius settings.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We use your location only while the app is active to show nearby profiles and apply your radius/visibility settings.
